problem_definition.command_line: make clean-run-debug; mpiexec fluidity -v2 -l empty_partitions.flml; mpiexec fluidity -v2 -l empty_partitions_2_checkpoint.flml

variables.variable: import os files = os.listdir("./") solvers_converged = not "matrixdump" in files and not "matrixdump.info" in files

import vtk reader=vtk.vtkXMLPUnstructuredGridReader() reader.SetFileName("empty_partitions_1.pvtu") reader.Update() V = reader.GetOutput() owners = 0 o = [] for i in range(V.GetNumberOfPoints()): O = V.GetPointData().GetArray("NodeOwner").GetValue(i) if O not in o: o.append(O) owners += 1
